```{r}
here::i_am("r-101-grade-analysis.Rproj")
library(dplyr)
library(ggplot2)
library(vroom)
```
## Question 1

```{r}
grades <- vroom("grades.csv")
```
## Question 2

```{r}
exam_grades <- 
  grades |>
  summarise('max'=max(Exam, na.rm=TRUE), 'min'=min(Exam, na.rm=TRUE), 'median'=median(Exam, na.rm=TRUE), 'mean'=mean(Exam, na.rm=TRUE))

knitr::kable(exam_grades)
```
